head.supplied: 12th January [188]9 ¶ Sir, ¶ ¶ Will you have the goodness to examine the accompanying sample of timber and foliage from Mount Cole, near Ararat and report as to the nature of the timber and its durab...

div.p: No 89/89, unit 47, p. 18, VPRS 431, outward registered correspondence, Engineer in Chief, VA 2876, Victorian Railways, Public Record Office, Victoria.

Will you have the goodness to examine the accompanying sample of timber and foliage from Mount Cole, near Ararat and report as to the nature of the timber and its durability and suitability for railway purposes.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I have the honor to be,

div.p: Baron F. Von Mueller M.D. K.C.M.G. &c
